channel.title: Developer on Doug's Dabblings | Quick thoughts on stuff I'm playing with
channel.description: Recent content in Developer on Doug's Dabblings | Quick thoughts on stuff I'm playing with

item.title: Sometimes You Should Blame Your Tools
item.description: Welcome back to our blog series discussing Crunchy Postgres via Automation (CPA) and the team behind it. This week, we’re going to talk about the tooling used by the team and discuss some of the agile-lite processes we’ve adopted.

item.title: Reconstructing a Development Team
item.description: Welcome to our third installment in this blog series discussing Crunchy Postgres via Automation(CPA). This week, we’re going to talk about the team that I work with, it’s membership, its structure, the responsibilities, etc.
